name: Kawaii Girl
description:
Two DLC unlocking postures:1. Click to download DLC





https://store.steampowered.com/widget/1268300

2. Press "Win + R" to input:
steam://install/1268300
Press enter to download the free DLC
Note: after adding DLC, you need to check it manually in the steam library


---------------------------------

This is an interesting casual shooting game, which can train your observation ability and reaction ability. At the beginning of the game, use a variety of firearms to fight. You need to use the minerals of the level as soon as possible to get money, and buy powerful weapons to make the level easier to pass before the monster becomes stronger.
Then, wipe out a large number of enemies. After solving the score required for each level. You can start the next step~





----------------------------------




Control introduction
Move:WSAD
Shoot: Left mouse Button
Change Weapon:T
Reload:R
Dash:F
Inventory:V
Pause:Esc




In the game, we also added the "F8 Key" for you to pass the customs quickly

We have 9 different levels for you to experience.
